sections.title: Questions - Reporting Obligations of Manufacturers - Article 14

questions.title: Main Establishment in the EU
questions.content: Have you identified the Member State of your main establishment for submitting notifications via the CSIRT coordinator?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: No EU Establishment
questions.content: If you have no main establishment in the EU, can you determine the correct CSIRT based on **in order**:

questions.title: Notification Submission Method (CSIRT Coordinator) - Q1
questions.content: Have you identified **the EU Member State where your authorised representative is established**, _specifically the representative that acts on your behalf for the highest number of products with digital elements (PDEs)_?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Notification Submission Method (CSIRT Coordinator) - Q2
questions.content: Have you determined **which importer places the highest number of your PDEs on the EU market**, and **in which Member State that importer is established**?  If no authorised representative exists, this becomes the **next criterion**.

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Notification Submission Method (CSIRT Coordinator) - Q3
questions.content: Have you identified **the distributor who makes available the highest number of your PDEs**, and **the EU Member State where that distributor is established**?  This is the **third fallback criterion**.

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Notification Submission Method (CSIRT Coordinator) - Q4
questions.content: Have you assessed **which Member State has the highest number of users** of your PDEs?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

subsections.title: **Consistent CSIRT Reporting** ( Depending on the Submission Method )

questions.title: **Consistent CSIRT Reporting** ( Depending on the Submission Method ) - Q1
questions.content: Once a CSIRT has been designated as the coordinator for your product (after selecting it according to the rules in points (a)–(d)), do you ensure that **all subsequent notifications** of actively exploited vulnerabilities or severe incidents for that product are **submitted to the same CSIRT**, even if future incidents occur in different Member States?

questions.title: Automatic Format
